Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class PlayerConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.PlayerConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class PlayerConnection extends Object implements Runnable
This class is used to manages a player. His socket is listened to and every message received is handled if recognized.

    • handlePacket

      public void handlePacket(Object rawPacket)
      Handles a generic packet coming from the client. If the object is recognized it is actually handles, otherwise and error is printed and nothing is done.
      Parameters:
      rawPacket - Object coming form the client.
